import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Card from '../../../../components/Card'; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios"; export default function ProductAdd() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(); const [productName, setProductName] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [availability, setAvailability] = useState(''); const [imageurl, setImageurl] = useState('') const [data2,setData2]= useState({}) const history = useHistory(); let handleNameChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value); setProductName(e.target.value) } let handleDescripChange = (e) =>{ setDescription(e.target.value) } let handlePriceChange = (e) => { setPrice(e.target.value) } let handleAvailabilityChange = (e) => { setAvailability(e.target.value) } let handleCategoryChange = (e) => { setCategory(e.target.value) } const addProduct = () =>{ const data = new FormData(); data.append('firstName', firstName) data.append('lastName', lastName) data.append('dateOfHire', dateOfHire) let result = '' axios.post("http://192.168.1.117:8089/api/instructor/add", { firstName:firstName, lastName:lastName, dateOfHire:dateOfHire } ).then(()=>{ console.log("added"); }) } const onSubmit = async (e) => { // console.log(imageurl); addProduct(); history.push("/product"); } return ( <>
